func:
var res=global.get("res");
var rev=global.get("rev");
var email=global.get("email");
var prevq=global.get("prevq");
msg.payload={
    "_id":email,
    "_rev":rev,
    "first_name":msg.payload.first_name,
    "last_name":msg.payload.last_name,
    "gender":msg.payload.gender,
    "password":msg.payload.password,
    "address":msg.payload.address,
    "street":msg.payload.street,
    "pin":msg.payload.pin,
    "city":msg.payload.city,
    "code":msg.payload.code,
    "phone":msg.payload.phone,
    "your_email":msg.payload.your_email,
    "checkbox":msg.payload.checkbox,
    "register":msg.payload.register,
    "res":res,
    "prevq":prevq
    
}
return msg;

func:
var email=global.get("email");
msg.payload={
    "_id":email,
    "first_name":msg.payload.first_name,
    "last_name":msg.payload.last_name,
    "gender":msg.payload.gender,
    "password":msg.payload.password,
    "address":msg.payload.address,
    "street":msg.payload.street,
    "pin":msg.payload.pin,
    "city":msg.payload.city,
    "code":msg.payload.code,
    "phone":msg.payload.phone,
    "your_email":msg.payload.your_email,
    "checkbox":msg.payload.checkbox,
    "register":msg.payload.register,
    "res":"",

}
return msg;
